body:
Continuing on #20305, this proposes a `setfeerate` RPC to potentially replace `settxfee`.

Help doc
```
$ ./src/bitcoin-cli help setfeerate
setfeerate amount

Set the transaction fee rate in sat/vB for this wallet. Overrides the global -paytxfee configuration option.
Can be deactivated by passing 0 as the fee rate, in which case automatic fee selection will be used by default.

Arguments:
1. amount    (numeric or string, required) The transaction fee rate in sat/vB to set (0 to unset)

Result:
{                      (json object)
  "result" : "str",    (string, optional) Description of result, if successful
  "error" : "str"      (string, optional) Description of error, if any
}

Examples:

Set a fee rate of 1 sat/vB
> bitcoin-cli setfeerate 1

Set a fee rate of 3.141 sat/vB
> bitcoin-cli setfeerate 3.141

Set a fee rate of 7.75 sat/vB with named arguments
> bitcoin-cli -named setfeerate amount=7.75

Set a fee rate of 25 sat/vB with the RPC
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id": "curltest", "method": "setfeerate", "params": [25]}' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:8332/
```

Successful responses
```json
$ ./src/bitcoin-cli setfeerate 3.14
{
  "result": "Transaction fee rate successfully set to 3.140 sat/B"
}

$ ./src/bitcoin-cli setfeerate 0
{
  "result": "Transaction fee rate successfully deactivated; by default, automatic fee selection will be used"
}
```

Error responses
```json
$ ./src/bitcoin-cli setfeerate 0.5 
{
  "error": "The requested transaction fee rate of 0.500 sat/B cannot be less than the minimum relay fee rate of 1.000 sat/B"
}

$ ./src/bitcoin-cli -named setfeerate amount=10000.001
{
  "error": "The requested transaction fee rate of 10000.001 sat/B cannot be more than the wallet max fee rate of 10000.000 sat/B"
}
```
title: wallet: introduce setfeerate (an improved settxfee, in sat/vB)
